replies.message: I sexually Identify as an Attack Helicopter. Ever since I was a boy I dreamed of soaring over the oilfields dropping hot sticky loads on disgusting foreigners. People say to me that a person being a helicopter is Impossible and I’m fucking retarded but I don’t care, I’m beautiful. I’m having a plastic surgeon install rotary blades, 30 mm cannons and AMG-114 Hellfire missiles on my body. From now on I want you guys to call me “Apache” and respect my right to kill from above and kill needlessly. If you can’t accept me you’re a heliphobe and need to check your vehicle privilege. Thank you for being so understanding.

Do you have a #Monster within you? Im sure everybody does somewhere deep in themselves right. I would like to present to you 

" JaySaint Da Synnr - Im a Monster now x Sir Flo x Sammi Auto "

Just a lil Single i cooked up with some homies from my Home town. Enjoy the track and Share away. Dont forget to VOTE today for my submission in the FV contest this year and get Ready for my new Album that will be dropping soon. #ChronicLogic
